answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Hi Martha,
The International Public Management Association (IPMA) has information. Here's their website.
http://www.ipma-hr.org/
Best regards,

answers.author: Martha Villanigro-Santiago
answers.text:
Hi Evelina,
Today is my first day back to work. I visited your website and got some ideas.
Thanks.
Martha

answers.author: Michael Repas
answers.text:
Hi Martha:
It may also be worth checking out the Society for Human Resource Management, and their website can be accessed via http://www.shrm.org/Pages/default.aspx
I hope this helps!

author: Martha Villanigro-Santiago
text: Where could I find examples of competencies developed for EEO management positions in government? I am part of a team developing competencies of management positions in preparation for succession planning.
title: Management Competencies
